page.title: 16A Day in the Life of A.Blair
page.content: (cont. from p.15) Friday is my busiest day.From now until{12.00 noon}there is a constant stream of customers at my counter wanting all manner of services:Stamps,Postal Orders,Licences,Pensions,Family Allowances,Explorer Bus Tickets,Traveelers Cheques for their holidays to name but a few.Normally {12.00}brings asome relief and a break for lunch but alas not today.It is Friday _ Post Office accounting day when all the weeks business has to be added up and accounted for.I have been preparing for this all during the week but on a friday I take some of the forms and documents upstairs and list them while eating my lunch,which,for ease of preparation is always the same on a Friday _ wait for it _ {PIE AND {PEAS}and a cup of tea!!!!!!!!!
